p: Doxorubicin was purchased from Apollo (BID0120; Opelika, AL), staurosporine was purchased from Biotrend (BS0188; Zurich, SUI) and vandetanib was purchased from Selleckchem (S1046, Houston, TX, USA). Test compounds were synthesised by research group at Department of Organic Chemistry, Faculty of Chemical Engineering and Technology, University of Zagreb.
